scripts.prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:-production} PORT=${PORT:-7002} node -r dotenv-flow/config build/server.js
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:-development} PORT=${PORT:-7000} ts-node-dev -r dotenv-flow/config -r tsconfig-paths/register src/server.ts
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:-test} PORT=${PORT:-7001} TYPE=all TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{ "module": "CommonJS" }' mocha -r dotenv-flow/config -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register
scripts.test:e2e: cross-env NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:-test} PORT=${PORT:-7001} TYPE=e2e TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{ "module": "CommonJS" }' mocha -r dotenv-flow/config -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register
scripts.test:unit: cross-env NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:-test} TYPE=unit TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{ "module": "CommonJS" }' mocha -r dotenv-flow/config -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register
scripts.db:seed: cross-env NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:-development} ts-node -r dotenv-flow/config -r tsconfig-paths/register scripts/seed.ts
scripts.db:wipe: cross-env NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:-development} ts-node -r dotenv-flow/config -r tsconfig-paths/register scripts/wipe.ts
scripts.db:migrate:generate: cross-env NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:-development} ts-node -r dotenv-flow/config -r tsconfig-paths/register scripts/migrate.ts generate
scripts.db:migrate:create: cross-env NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:-development} ts-node -r dotenv-flow/config -r tsconfig-paths/register scripts/migrate.ts create
scripts.db:migrate:up: cross-env NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:-development} ts-node -r dotenv-flow/config -r tsconfig-paths/register scripts/migrate.ts up
scripts.db:migrate:down: cross-env NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:-development} ts-node -r dotenv-flow/config -r tsconfig-paths/register scripts/migrate.ts down
scripts.db:migrate:show: cross-env NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:-development} ts-node -r dotenv-flow/config -r tsconfig-paths/register scripts/migrate.ts show
